void USBD_ClearINT ( u32  INTFlag)

Clear USB Device interrupt flag.

Parameters:
INTFlag,:USB Device global interrupt flag
  • SOFIF | URSTIF | RSMIF | SUSPIF | ESOFIF EP0IF | EP1IF | EP2IF | EP3IF | EP4IF | EP5IF | EP6IF | EP7IF | EP8IF | EP9IF
Return values:
None

u32  INTFlag 
)

Clear Interrupt for Endpoint.

Parameters:
USBD_EPTn,:USB Endpoint number
  • USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
INTFlag,:Interrupt flag
  • OTRXIF | ODRXIF | ODOVIF | ITRXIF | IDTXIF | NAKIF | STLIF | UERIF | STRXIF | SDRXIF | SDERIF | ZLRXIF
Return values:
None

u32 USBD_EPTReadMemory ( USBD_EPTn_Enum  USBD_EPTn,
u32 *  pTo,
u32  len 
)

Read memory from endpoint buffer.

Parameters:
USBD_EPTn,:USB Endpoint number
  • USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
pTo,:Destination buffer
len,:Length for read OUT data
Return values:
Totallength read by this function

Definition at line 731 of file ht32f5xxxx_usbd.c.

u32 USBD_EPTReadOUTData ( USBD_EPTn_Enum  USBD_EPTn,
u32 *  pTo,
u32  len 
)

Read OUT Data from USB buffer to User buffer.

Parameters:
USBD_EPTn,:USB Endpoint number
  • USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT9
pTo,:Destination memory
len,:Length for read OUT data, set as 0 for discard current OUT data in the USB buffer
Return values:
Totallength read by this function

Definition at line 674 of file ht32f5xxxx_usbd.c.

USBD_EPTn_Enum USBD_GetEPTnINTNumber ( u32  INTFlag)

Get USB Endpoint number by interrupt flag.

Parameters:
INTFlag,:USB Device global interrupt flag
  • SOFIF | URSTIF | RSMIF | SUSPIF | ESOFIF EP0IF | EP1IF | EP2IF | EP3IF | EP4IF | EP5IF | EP6IF | EP7IF | EP8IF | EP9IF
Return values:
USBEndpoint number from USBD_EPT1 ~ USBD_EPT9
